price: Kuma wanda ya kasance makãho* a cikin wannan sabõda haka shi a Lãhira makãho ne kuma mafi ɓata ga hanya.
arabic: وَمَن كَانَ فِي هَٰذِهِۦٓ أَعۡمَىٰ فَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَعۡمَىٰ وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: * Muƙarana a tsakãnin makantar basĩra da makantar ganin ido.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman kāna fī hādhihi aʿmā fahuwa fī al-ākhirati aʿmā wa-aḍallu sabīlan
